name: Robohead
description:
a 2D platformer where you have to use your head

contains 15 levels total, some may be quite hard

controls

  • left/right arrow - move
  • space - launch head
  • space (while head has been launched) - teleport to head
  • R - reset

tools i used

  • engine - unity
  • art - piksel
  • music - lmms
  • sound effects - bfxr
